skill1: Attacks the enemy by slashing from above, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

name: Mui

name: Sharun

At the end of the turn, grants a barrier (proportional to the caster's max Health) to the ally with the highest Attack except for the caster for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 25%.

Increases Just Trust Me's barrier strength by 15%.

skill3: With the Goddess's authority, dispels all debuffs from all allies before increasing Combat Readiness by 25%. Consumes 20% of the current Health of the ally granted offering, granting abundance to all other allies for 2 turns.

This effect will not be applied to the Combat Readiness increase effect triggered by the same skill.

Murderous Intent: Grants a barrier to the caster for 3 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 25%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skill1: Attacks the enemy with a sword and absorbs some of the damage dealt as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
